column1: Funeral Services will be held on Saturday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 AM at The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints with Bishop Blain Given officiating. Interment will follow at Cedarwood Cemetery in Roanoke Rapids.    The family will receive friends on Friday
column5: 2015 from 7:00 to 8:30 PM at Askew Funeral and Cremation Services.
